Information Science and Statistics

A collection of books on information science and statistics, including time series analysis, machine learning, probabilistic networks, and more. The document lists the editors and contributors, including notable figures such as Christopher M. Bishop, Michael Jordan, and Jon Kleinberg.

Key Concepts:

  • Time Series Analysis
  • Probabilistic Networks
  • Neural Network Methodology
  • Computer Intrusion Detection
